# isValidPartyCode(_:)

**Type Method**

Checks whether a party code is in valid format.

## Declaration

```swift
class func isValidPartyCode(_ partyCode: String) -> Bool
```

## Discussion

Party code should be two parts of strings with the same length (2-6) connected with a dash, and the code can be either pure digits (0-9), or both parts are uppercased characters from [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKGameActivity/validPartyCodeAlphabet].

## Getting and verifying the party code

- **partyCode**: If the game supports party code, this is the party code that can be shared among players to join the party.
- **partyURL**: If the game supports party code, this is the URL that can be shared among players to join the party.
- **validPartyCodeAlphabet**: Allowed characters for the party code to be used to share this activity.
